snippet: Wall Street fell on Monday as the partial shutdown of the United States government entered a seventh day and little progress was seen in raising the country’s debt limit.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street fell on Monday as the partial shutdown of the United States government entered a seventh day and little progress was seen in raising the country’s debt limit.

headline.main: Budget Showdown Weighs on Stock Markets
headline.print_headline: Budget Showdown Weighs on Stock Markets
